001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonToken;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationContext;
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer;
008import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
009
010import java.io.IOException;
011
012/**
013 * Deserialize a hex string to a bitcoinj {@link Sha256Hash} type.
014 */
015public class Sha256HashDeserializer  extends JsonDeserializer<Sha256Hash> {
016    @Override
017    public Sha256Hash deserialize(JsonParser p, DeserializationContext ctxt) throws IOException, JsonProcessingException {
018        JsonToken token = p.getCurrentToken();
019        switch (token) {
020            case VALUE_STRING:
021                return Sha256Hash.wrap(p.getValueAsString());
022            default:
023                return (Sha256Hash) ctxt.handleUnexpectedToken(Sha256Hash.class, p);
024        }
025    }
026}
